articles.title: LBC presenter Steve Allen to leave station after 44 years - BBC
articles.description: The radio station's longest-serving presenter Steve Allen says it's been an "honour and privilege".
articles.content:
Veteran broadcaster Steve Allen has announced he is to leave the LBC radio station after 44 years.
